## Theme Name
What should the theme be called?

## Theme Description
Describe the visual style and inspiration for this theme.

## Color Palette
If you have specific colors in mind, list them here (hex codes preferred).

## Reference
Include any reference images, screenshots, or links that show the style you're going for.

## Additional context
Any other details about the theme.
